author: The Journal Team
title: Donald Trump says a ‘total ceasefire’ has been agreed between Israel and Iran
description: The US President announced plans for a ceasefire to begin within the next number of hours, following on from an Iranian attack on a US military base in Qatar earlier today.
content:
LAST UPDATE|20 mins ago
The Journal / YouTubeUS PRESIDENT DONALD Trump has announced that Iran and Israel have agreed to a ceasefire.
The announcement comes after Iran launched an attack on America… [+45805 chars]
